feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for the United States Issued by the National Weather Service

entry.title: Flood Watch issued October 12 at 4:15PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...The following area, Northern Inner Channels. This includes the cities of Skagway, Klukwan, And Haines. * WHEN...Through Friday morning.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 4:03PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Heavy Rain Expected Through Thursday Night... A low pressure system over the eastern Gulf of Alaska will continue to move northwest along the coast through early Friday. Precipitation amounts across the region so far have been around 1 inch. Heavy rain will move over the area this evening with an additional 1 to 2 inches through Friday morning is expected. The latest satellite rain rate
entry.cap:areaDesc: Admiralty Island; Cape Fairweather to Lisianski Strait; City and Borough of Juneau; City and Borough of Sitka; City and Borough of Yakutat; Eastern Chichagof Island; Glacier Bay
